pageContext.claim: “United States Steel is opening up six plants....So, we have jobs, we have a vibrant industry, in a short -- the head of United States Steel called me the other day. And he said, "Mr. President, I'd like to thank you. I have never seen anything like it. We haven't opened up a new plant in 32 years. And now we're opening up seven of them. "Six of them extensions. "We're going to build a new one." And that's just one company.”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. Steel has not announced the opening of seven facilities. (In the past Trump has claimed six.) The company has only announced the reopening of two blast furnaces at a plant in Illinois.
